pages.text: Disruption Explosives create an ender disruption lasting 10s that teleports most mobs/players inside it to a random location up to 128 blocks away. The initial explosion damages and stops endermen & endermites from teleporting for 15s. Explosive blocks and grenades explode with radii of 9 and 5 blocks, respectively. Like endermen, these explosives lose their efficacy under water!
